name: Survey generator
description: Generate survey questions based on specific criteria.

nodes.name: llm
nodes.title: Answers
nodes.description: Answer a question using a large language model. Chat history can be used to maintain context between messages.

goal.title: Goal
goal.description: What is the goal of the survey? E.g. to measure engagement, get feedback or more.

ui_metadata.value: To understand the use cases for customer experience and their priorities.

context.title: Context
context.description: Set the context of what kind of product/event/research is the survey for.

ui_metadata.value: To survey customer experience leaders on what use cases they would like to enhance with AI.

number_of_questions.title: Number of survey questions
number_of_questions.description: How many survey questions would you like the AI to generate?
